col.name: alt_sample_name
description: if another identifier is used, for example in supplemental tables

col.name: sample_type
description: "healthy" should be only from individuals without cancer, "adjacentnormal" from individuals with cancer, "metastatic" for non-primary tumors

col.name: subtype
description: ser=serous;endo=endometrioid;endo_clearcell=mixture of ser+endo.  Other includes sarcomatoid, endometroid, papillary serous, adenocarcinoma, dysgerminoma

col.name: T
description: Stage (1-4).  If multiple stages given (eg 34), use the highest

col.name: substage
description: substage (abcd).  For cases like ab, bc, use highest given

col.name: G
description: G (1-4): If multiple given, ie 12, 23, use highest given

col.name: N
description: N (0/1): degree of spread to regional lymph nodes

col.name: days_to_tumor_recurrence
description: time to recurrence or last follow-up in days

col.name: days_to_death
description: time to death or last follow-up in days

col.name: site_of_tumor_first_recurrence
description: none for no recurrence, na for unknown

col.name: primary_therapy_outcome_success
description: response to any kind of therapy (including radiation only).

col.name: chemo_response
description: platinum resistance: refractory=3mo or less, resistant=6mo or less, sensitive=12mo or higher

col.name: inferred_chemo_response
description: inferred platinum resistance: refractory=death in 6mo or less, sensitive=survival for 12mo or more
